attributes.action: Bring Back Tim Lovejoy to Soccer AM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever since Tim has left the programme after the end of his last show, you knew that it would be impossible to replace him.
And after watching the latest intallments of Soccer AM, the show is not the same. Tim Lovejoy is Soccer AM, and the show needs you back.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
